A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They tried to include everything in a single movie. It's a lot. Snoke still not clear but it seems his job is done and you can barely feel the Kylo's conflict. And after this one\, you must face the fact that they will end this trilogy in about 3 hours. I think they could do better if they just slow it down and explain everything step by step. But still\, I really enjoy this. They created a lot of surprises for us.\nI cried for my Princess Leia. It's been one year but I still cannot accept that. Really Love they use \"In Loving Memory of Our Princess\, Carrie Fisher\" at the end.
